definition: as the time draws near/at the last moment/temporary/interim/ad hoc
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
lit. to clasp the Buddha's feet when danger arises (idiom); fig. to profess devotion only when in trouble/doing things at the last minute/making a hasty last-minute effort

lit. to clasp the Buddha's feet when danger arises (idiom); fig. to profess devotion only when in trouble/doing things at the last minute/to make a hasty last-minute effort (often refers to cramming for exams)
pinyin: ping2 shi2 bu4 shao1 xiang1 , lin2 shi2 bao4 fo2 jiao3
containing_words.word: 平时不烧香，临时抱佛脚

definition: Provisional Municipal Council of Macau/Câmara Municipal de Macau Provisória
pinyin: lin2 shi2 Ao4 men2 shi4 zheng4 zhi2 xing2 wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 临时澳门市政执行委员会

sentences.english: Temporary mount directory where sysadmins can mount filesystems.
sentences.chinese: 系统管理员临时加载文件系统的地方。

sentences.english: Bond, comes with the war, is my understanding after read this chapter.
sentences.chinese: 债券，随着战争来临时，是我阅读本章后的理解。

sentences.english: Temporary foreigners' residence permits shall be issued to those residing in China for less than a year.
sentences.chinese: 外国人临时居留证，发给在中国居留不满一年的人员。

sentences.english: The temporary concrete lining guard wall method was used in excavating vertical shaft.
sentences.chinese: 竖井开挖采用了临时混凝士衬砌护壁措施。

sentences.english: I don't have any photos of the temps…they were done from the wax-up.
sentences.chinese: 我没有临时贴面的照片，他们是根据蜡牙制作的。

sentences.english: On news of approaching enemy aircraft a gong sounded to warn the inhabitants.
sentences.chinese: 当敌人飞机来临时用敲锣的方式通知民众。

sentences.english: Recognize that working for this person is "a  temporary assignment.
sentences.chinese: 却认为这个人工作只是“一项临时任务。

sentences.english: Due to delayed and irregular reporting these, figures should be considered provisional.
sentences.chinese: 由于延迟和不定期报告，应将这些数字视为临时数字。

sentences.english: More than a third of the workforce is now part-time or temporary employees.
sentences.chinese: 现在超过三分之一的工人成为兼职工或者临时工。

sentences.english: The occasional Damara and Herero homesteads bear no trace of the Germanic penchant for order;
sentences.chinese: 的临时家园丝毫不没有留下日耳曼人的倾向。
他给临时来照看孩子的保姆付了钱。

sentences.english: A rapid rundown in inventories and temporary distortions in credit markets (see article) have not helped.
sentences.chinese: 库存量的快速削减和信贷市场上的临时畸变于事无补。

sentences.english: this is our makeshift dining room/margaux’s office.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们临时的饭厅兼margaux的工作室。

sentences.english: Because of the baby-sitting function, they will not empty the schools.
sentences.chinese: 因为临时保姆的职能，学校始终都会有学生。

sentences.english: This is the half-yearly meeting of the interim committee.
sentences.chinese: 这是临时委员会的半年度会议。

definition: to respond to an emergency/to meet a contingency/(attributive) emergency
to start using/(computing) to enable (a feature)
to seal/to close/to confine/to seal off/to close down/sealed/confined/closed/unreceptive
to add to existing facilities or services
to shift to an earlier date/to do sth ahead of time/in advance
